notes.text: SmartFilterBar: prevent calling ensureFilterLoaded on each onBeforeRendering
SmartVariantManagement: Return persistencyKey default empty string for FilterBar
SmartTable: correct metadata retrieval when conditionTypeInfo is used
FilterBar: suspend items binding of not visible controls
SmartChart: Notification is now provided when measures or dimensions are insufficient for the selected chart type
SmartVariantManagement: Show default variant, if currently selected one is deleted
